snippet.title: Summoners Fate Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Now on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1181148431/summoners-fate-fast-and-fun-tactical-rpg-ccg-adven?ref=7utc3i. Support development and join our amazing community.

Summoners Fate is a top-down adventure that combines exploration, card collecting and tactical combat. You control the fate of your Summoner and command an ever-changing band of companions. Defeat monstrous hordes and reap the rewards of treasures, allies, and powerful spells as you advance deeper into unknown lands. Are these chance encounters or do they connect to a greater meaning?

Let's spread the word about Summoners Fate! Please support us through your social networks so we can reach all fans of the turn-based RPG + CCG adventure genre.

Subscribe to our Newsletter: http://d20studios.us15.list-manage.com/subscribe/post?u=6458e2e95afe953ac79725710&id=679d8a7efe
Official Game Website: http://summonersfate.com
D20Studios Website: http://d20studios.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/D20Studios/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/d20studio
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2Rah8ZTsAs2aGAlKgcdO0w
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/d20studios/
Game Dev Chats: http://gamedevchats.com
Imgur: https://d20studios.imgur.com/
DevLog (TIG Source): https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=61234.0
DevLog (IndieDB): http://www.indiedb.com/games/summoners-fate
